secrets.desc:
You can store passwords and secrets in standard .env format, one per line.
Add comments using # to help the agent understand the purpose of each secret.
See example below.

Add comments using # to help the agent understand the purpose of each secret.

tunnel.heading: Flare Tunnel
tunnel.description: Create a secure public URL to access your Agent Zero instance anytime, anywhere.
tunnel.share: Share this URL to allow others to access your Agent Zero instance.
tunnel.persistence: This URL will persist until you stop the tunnel or restart the Docker container.
speech.title: Microphone settings
backup.title: Create Backup
backup.opsPlaceholder: File operations will be displayed here...
restore.title: Restore Backup
restore.restartNotice: After restoring a backup you will have to restart Agent-Zero to fully load the backed-up configuration (button in the left pane).
restore.clean: Clean before restore (delete existing files matching original backup patterns)
restore.cleanDesc: When enabled, all existing files matching the original backup patterns will be deleted before restoring files from the archive. This ensures a completely clean restore state.
mcp.title: MCP Servers Configuration
mcp.exampleDesc:
Agent Zero uses standard JSON configuration known from other AI applications.
The configuration is a JSON object containing "mcpServers" object where each key is an individual MCP server.
Local servers are defined by a "command", "args", "env" variables.
Remote servers are defined by a "url", "headers".
"disabled" can be set to true to disable a server without removing config.
Custom "description" can be set to provide additional information about the server to A0.
All servers can also define "init_timeout" and "tool_timeout" which override global settings.
files.title: File Browser
files.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
files.sizeExceeded: File exceeds the maximum allowed size of 100MB
a2a.title: Connection to A0 A2A Server
a2a.desc: Agent Zero A2A Server enables FastA2A protocol communication with other agents.
a2a.instructions: Other agents can connect using the URL below (replace host if needed):
a2a.apiInfo: The token used in the URL is automatically generated from your username and password. This same token is also used for external API endpoints. The token changes when you update your credentials.
api.title: Agent Zero External API Examples
api.intro1: Agent Zero provides external API endpoints for integration with other applications.
api.intro2: These endpoints use API key authentication and support text messages and file attachments.
api.tokenInfo: The API token is automatically generated from your username and password. This same token is used for both MCP server connections and external API endpoints. The token changes when you update your credentials.
api.messageDesc: Send messages to Agent Zero and receive responses. Supports text messages, file attachments, and conversation continuity.
api.logDesc: Retrieve log data by context ID, limited to a specified number of entries from the newest.
api.terminateDesc: Terminate and remove a chat context to free up resources. Similar to the MCP finish_chat function.
api.resetDesc: Reset a chat context to clear conversation history while keeping the context_id alive for continued use.
api.filesDesc: Retrieve file contents by paths, returning files as base64 encoded data. Useful for retrieving uploaded attachments.
